flavor_text: The aroma that rises from its petals contains asubstance that calms aggressive feelings.
MEGANIUM's breath has the power to revive dead grassand plants. It can make them healthy again.
Anyone who stands beside it becomes refreshed just asif they were relaxing in a sunny forest.
The fragrance of MEGANIUM's flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle this Pokemon gives off moreof its becalming scent to blunt the foe's fighting spirit.
